english.segment1: (verse 1). Imagine me, another puppet in a daydream. A product of the toymaker's hand. You sent down your son to save a world of expectators. and turn this wooden boy into a man
english.segment2: (pre-chorus 1). Your curtain came down on the puppet master's crown. and now I've got no strings to hold me down. you said:
english.segment3: (chorus). Ever after came to be. When they nailed me to the tree. This is not a fantasy. 30 Pieces, paid the price. But I wrote the story line. And everything will be just fine
english.segment4: (verse 2). Imagine me, another bluebird in a theme song. Flying over every rainbow's peak. You held out your hand across a million movie theaters. To prove your love was all I'll ever need
english.segment5: (pre-chorus 2). The twister came down, it brought me to my knees. You put a new heart where a tin one used to be. You said:
english.segment7: (pre-chorus 3). The hammer came down it nailed you to the tree. What were you thinking, was it all because of me
english.segment8: (verse 3). Imagine me, another Ella in the cinders. underneath my wicked mother's thumb. You held out your hand, you had a royal invitation. to anyone who'd want to meet your son.
english.segment9: (pre-chorus 4). Your spirit came down, made a new girl out of me. I tried your love on and it fit me perfectly. You said:
